entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain ending this morning then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 5 with temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
